hero.title: Saudi Talent Sourcing Agency and Portal - Talent Solutions Hub
hero.subtitle: Faster Ways to Find the Right Talent & Job
hero.description: One platform that gives you everything you need to fill your talent or job needs. If you are looking for verified talent, Ready to Work has it all. Find the perfect match for your team or your career today.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.subtitle: Search over 30,475 skilled candidates ready to work.
candidates.signInAsEmployerToView: Sign in as employer to view
candidates.zeroCandidatesMessage: New profiles are added regularly. Browse the full directory when you're ready.

majorDisciplines.title: Explore job by Major Discipline
majorDisciplines.subtitle: Our platform connects you with top employers across various industries

uploadResume.title: Put Yourself Out There
uploadResume.description: Want to get hired by the best and top companies in the world? We work with organisations looking for exactly the kind of talent you have. Connect today with them through Ready to Work.

blog.title: Our Blog: Your Path to Career Success
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest trends in hiring and career success

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Have a Question?
faq.description: Save time with straightforward answers to common questions that business managers and HR teams often ask.
faq.contactUsDescription: Get in touch and we'll take care of the rest.

verifiedTalent.question: How can I find verified talent in Saudi Arabia?
verifiedTalent.answer: Ready to Work provides a curated database of pre-screened professionals across industries. Employers can quickly access qualified candidates without worrying about unreliable or fake profiles.

topAgency.question: What makes Ready to Work a top Saudi talent sourcing agency?
topAgency.answer: The platform combines technology with local hiring knowledge for precise talent matching. Employers and candidates benefit from a digital-first approach and reliable, long-term results.

applyForJobs.question: How do I apply for jobs through Ready to Work?
applyForJobs.answer: Candidates can upload resumes and apply directly through the platform. The system ensures applications reach verified employers, making the job search faster and more efficient.

startupsLargeCompanies.question: Can Ready to Work help startups and large companies hire effectively?
startupsLargeCompanies.answer: Yes, the portal provides scalable hiring solutions tailored to company size and industry. From startups to established firms, businesses can confidently fill roles with the right talent.

newsletter.title: Ready to Work With the Right People?
newsletter.description: If you're looking to hire or find your next job, Ready to Work is here to help you step ahead with confidence. Begin shaping your future with a reliable Saudi recruitment agency that understands the modern Saudi workforce.
newsletter.privacyText: We care about your data, read our privacy policy.

intro.title: Flexible Pricing for Every Team Size

aboutIntro.title: About Ready To Work - A Saudi Recruitment Portal
aboutIntro.description: Ready To Work is a Saudi recruitment portal built to connect ambition with opportunity around the Kingdom. The system is designed for real careers and top companies.

ourWork.title: Who We Are
ourWork.paragraph1: We are more than just a bridge between employees and employers. It is a partner fulfilling your needs.
ourWork.paragraph2: Ready To Work was developed to make it easier for individuals to find employment in Saudi Arabia and for businesses to find qualified workers. To produce meaningful results, we integrate human insight with intelligent systems.
ourWork.paragraph3: We serve as a digital job search platform for candidates that goes beyond job postings. We serve as a talent-sourcing platform for employers, designed to streamline the hiring process and enhance decision-making.
ourWork.paragraph4: Our role is simple: To improve the fairness, speed, and clarity of the Saudi labour market.

step1.title: Create account
step1.description: Sign up in minutes and set up your personal profile to get started.

step2.title: Upload CV / Resume
step2.description: Add your CV and key details so employers can explore your experience and skills.

step3.title: Get matched & shortlisted
step3.description: We match you with relevant employers in your field.

step4.title: Meet potential employer & get Moving
step4.description: Meet and move forward with the employer that's right for you.

contact.label: Contact us
contact.title: Your Next Opportunity Starts Here with Us
contact.description: Ready To Work is here to help you move forward. Need a candidate for your new role or switching up the company? The opportunity here is just to prepare.
